devdoc.author: Shumpei Koike - <shumpei.koike@bridges.inc>

acceptOffer(uint256,string,(string,uint2.details: Accepts an offer by the Media.

params.tokenMetadata: string of the NFT token metadata

addPeriod(address,string,string,uint256,.details: Create a new period for a space. This function requires some params      to decide which kinds of pricing way and how much price to get started.

params.displayEndTimestamp: uint256 of the end timestamp for the display
params.displayStartTimestamp: uint256 of the start timestamp for the display
params.minPrice: uint256 of the minimum price to sell it out
params.saleEndTimestamp: uint256 of the end timestamp for the sale

addSpace(string).details: Creates a new space for the media account.

bidByEnglishAuction(uint256,address,uint.details: Bids to participate in an auction.      It is defined as an English Auction.

bidWithProposal(uint256,string,address,u.details: Bids to participate in an auction.      It is defined as an Open Bid.

deletePeriod(uint256).details: Deletes a period and its token.      If there is any users locking the fund for the sale, the amount would be transfered      to the user when deleting the period.

display(string).details: Displays the ad content that is approved by the media owner.

soldByDutchAuction(uint256,uint256).details: Buys the token that is defined as the specific period on an ad space.      The price is decreasing as time goes by, that is defined as an Dutch Auction.

soldByEnglishAuction(uint256).details: Receives the token you bidded if you are the successful bidder.

soldByFixedPrice(uint256,uint256).details: Buys the token that is defined as the specific period on an ad space.      The price of the token is fixed.

tokenIdsOf(string).details: Returns tokenIds tied with the space metadata

_periodKeys.details: Maps the space metadata with tokenIds of ad periods.

spaced.details: Returns spaceId that is tied with space metadata.

devdoc.title: AdPool - stores all ads accorss every space.
